title: Pose-Guided Human Parsing with Deep Learned Features
authors: F Xia, J Zhu, P Wang, A Yuille - arXiv preprint arXiv:1508.03881
excerpt: Abstract: Parsing human body into semantic regions is crucial to human-centric analysis. In this paper, we propose a segment-based parsing pipeline that explores human pose information, ie the joint location of a human model, which improves the part proposal,  ...
